TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit ScrollableControl/DockPaddingEdges extends System.Object implements class System.ICloneable

summary.span: 确定停靠控件的边界边距。

span.span: Determines the border padding for docked controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类在给定边缘或停靠控件的所有边缘上创建边距。The class creates a margin on a given edge or all edges of a docked control. 您可以通过设置以下属性来设置每个单独边缘的此边距宽度： 、、。You can set the width of this margin for each individual edge by setting the following properties: , , , . 或者，您可以通过设置 "" 属性，同时将所有边缘设置为同一宽度。Alternatively, you can set all the edges to the same width simultaneously by setting the property. 如果控件的大小对于其容器而言太大，则将调整控件的大小以适合容器，减去指定的边距宽度。If the size of the control is too large for its container, the control will be resized to fit in the container, minus the specified margin width. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生类 。The following code example uses the derived class, . 该示例在面板控件中停靠一个按钮，然后循环浏览 属性，然后在单击该按钮时分别设置每个属性。The example docks a button in a panel control and cycles through the properties, setting each individually on the click of the button. 此代码要求 控件和 已在窗体中实例化，而名为 `myCounter` 的类级别成员变量已声明为32位有符号整数。This code requires that a control and a have been instantiated on a form, and a class-level member variable named `myCounter` has been declared as a 32-bit signed integer. 应在按钮的 事件上调用此代码。This code should be called on the event of the button. [!code-cpp[Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置停靠控件的所有边缘的边距宽度。

span.span: Gets or sets the padding width for all edges of a docked control.

value.span: 以像素为单位的边距宽度。

span.span: The padding width, in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分配给此属性的填充宽度适用于停靠控件的所有边缘。The padding width assigned to this property is applied to all edges of the docked control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生类 。The following code example uses the derived class, . 该示例在面板控件中停靠一个按钮，然后循环浏览 属性，然后在单击该按钮时分别设置每个属性。The example docks a button in a panel control and cycles through the properties, setting each individually on the click of the button. 此代码要求 控件和 已在窗体中实例化，而名为 `myCounter` 的类级别成员变量已声明为32位有符号整数。This code requires that a control and a have been instantiated on a form, and a class-level member variable named `myCounter` has been declared as a 32-bit signed integer. 应在按钮的 事件上调用此代码。This code should be called on the event of the button. [!code-cpp[Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ScrollableControl.DockPaddingEdges Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets the padding width for the bottom edge of a docked control.

span.span: The padding width, in pixels.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分配给此属性的填充宽度仅应用于停靠控件的下边缘。The padding width assigned to this property is applied only to the bottom edge of the docked control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用派生类 。The following code example uses the derived class, . 该示例在面板控件中停靠一个按钮，然后循环浏览 属性，然后在单击该按钮时分别设置每个属性。The example docks a button in a panel control and cycles through the properties, setting each individually on the click of the button. 此代码要求 控件和 已在窗体中实例化，而名为 `myCounter` 的类级别成员变量已声明为32位有符号整数。This code requires that a control and a have been instantiated on a form, and a class-level member variable named `myCounter` has been declared as a 32-bit signed integer. 应在按钮的 事件上调用此代码。This code should be called on the event of the button.
